Key Match Events: Jordan Poole and Draymond Green had several exchanges during the game.
Jordan Poole intervened when Draymond Green was talking to a teammate.
Stephen Curry hit a deep ball right at the buzzer, and Draymond Green pointed at Jordan Poole.
Post-Match Reflections: Draymond Green credited Jordan Poole for playing 'a lot better' compared to last season.
Draymond Green said Jordan Poole is taking smarter shots.
Others: The Golden State Warriors won the game with a score of 125-112.
The game was a part of the 2024-21 NBA season.
